abilities.Strafing Run: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit (excluding units that can Fly), add 1 to the Hit Roll.
abilities.Deadly Demise D3: This unit has a chance to explode on death for D3 Mortal Wounds.
abilities.Hover: This unit can elect to be in Hover Mode instead of being useless

loadouts.name: Default Configuration
loadouts.description: This model is equipped with 2 Cognis Heavy Stubbers, 2 Heavy Phosphor Blasters, Twin Cognis Lascannon, Armoured Hull, Command Uplink
additional_abilities: Each time you select the bearer's unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6, on a 5+ you cain 1 Command Point.

loadouts.name: Chaff Launcher
loadouts.description: Each model's Command Uplink may be replaced with a Chaff Launcher
additional_abilities: This unit has the Smoke Keyword
